text: “Ndipo amene adatsogolera poyamba, a m’gulu la Amuhajirina ndi Answari, ndi omwe adawatsatira iwo mwa ubwino, Allah adzakondwa nawo. Naonso adzakondwera Naye (pa zomwe adzapatsidwa ndi Allah).
